meanings.definition: Decorated with ornamental trimmings or braids.
meanings.sent1: The gallooned jacket sparkled under the lights.
meanings.sent2: She wore a gallooned dress to the party.
meanings.sent3: The gallooned curtains made the room feel like a royal palace.
meanings.sent4: The gallooned cake was almost too beautiful to eat.
meanings.sent5: The gallooned pillow added a touch of elegance to the sofa.

meanings.definition: Adorned with decorative trimmings or braids.
meanings.sent1: The gallooned tablecloth was perfect for the fancy dinner.
meanings.sent2: He admired her gallooned hair accessory.
meanings.sent3: The gallooned Christmas tree looked like it came from a fairy tale.
meanings.sent4: Her gallooned shoes were the envy of all her friends.
meanings.sent5: The gallooned picture frame added a touch of sophistication to the room.
